title: The width of the street (if any) in front and the street (if any) at the side or near of the buildin
clause_text: The width of the street (if any) in front and the street (if any) at the side or near of the building, including proposed roads; The direction of north line relative to the plan of the building;

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
